tips.title: Pro Tips
items: Be specific about the goals and expected outcomes of this request.
Include links to any design references, examples, or inspiration.
Break down complex tasks into smaller, focused requests for faster delivery.
Mention any deadlines or time-sensitive requirements upfront.

tips.title: Pro Tips
tips.tip1: Be specific about the goals and expected outcomes of this request.
tips.tip2: Include links to any design references, examples, or inspiration.
tips.tip3: Break down complex tasks into smaller, focused requests for faster delivery.
tips.tip4: Mention any deadlines or time-sensitive requirements upfront.

form.titlePlaceholder: Summarize your request in a few words...

Help our specialists understand the objective. Include:
• Desired outcome
• Examples or references
• Technical constraints

welcome.title: Welcome to CartShift Portal!
welcome.description: We're thrilled to have you here. Let's take a quick tour to help you get started with your new workspace.

dashboard.title: Your Dashboard
dashboard.description: This is your command center. See an overview of your projects, track progress, and quickly access recent activity.

requests.title: Submit Requests
requests.description: Need something done? Create requests for new features, bug fixes, optimizations, or any other work. Our team will review and get started.

pricing.title: Pricing & Quotes
pricing.description: Review pricing proposals from our team, accept quotes, and manage payments — all in one place.

team.title: Team Collaboration
team.description: Invite colleagues to your workspace. Everyone on your team can submit requests and track progress together.

notifications.title: Stay Updated
notifications.description: Never miss an update. We'll notify you when there's activity on your requests or important status changes.

complete.title: You're All Set!
complete.description: Your workspace is ready. Start by creating your first request or explore the dashboard to see what's possible.

login.title: Welcome back
login.subtitle: Sign in to your CartShift portal

signup.title: Create your account
signup.subtitle: Get started with the CartShift portal
